languages.text: "Вот как", {n}— губернатор держит лицо.{/n} "Я хотел бы услышать ваши доводы".
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."
languages.original_text: "Вот как", {n}— губернатор держит лицо.{/n} "Я хотел бы услышать ваши доводы".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasons for saying that."
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasons for saying that."
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."
"Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

languages.text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Der Gouverneur bewahrt die Fassung.{/n} "Ich würde gerne Euren Gedankengang hören."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Der Gouverneur bewahrt die Fassung.{/n} "Ich würde gerne Euren Gedankengang hören."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? {n}demande le gouverneur en restant stoïque.{/n} J'aimerais savoir ce qui vous fait penser ça. »
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? {n}demande le gouverneur en restant stoïque.{/n} J'aimerais savoir ce qui vous fait penser ça. »

languages.text: “是这样吗？”{n}总督依然保持着冷静。{/n}“我想听听您的理由。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: “是这样吗？”{n}总督依然保持着冷静。{/n}“我想听听您的理由。”

languages.text: 「なるほど？」{n}総督は落ち着き払っている。{/n}「理由をお聞かせ願いたい」
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど？」{n}総督は落ち着き払っている。{/n}「理由をお聞かせ願いたい」

languages.text: «¿De verdad?». {n}El gobernador mantiene la compostura.{/n} «Me gustaría escuchar su razonamiento».
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad?». {n}El gobernador mantiene la compostura.{/n} «Me gustaría escuchar su razonamiento».

languages.text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Vali, soğukkanlılığını koruyor.{/n} "Bu sonuca nasıl vardığınızı duymak isterim."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}The governor maintains his composure.{/n} "I'd like to hear your reasoning."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Vali, soğukkanlılığını koruyor.{/n} "Bu sonuca nasıl vardığınızı duymak isterim."
